title: RAaEzo Man
description: A game created during my time at high school. A 2D fighting game with completely custom artwork and music. Created in Game Maker, this was the first completely unique project I had developed alone.

content.value: My name is Paul Doherty and I am a recent Computing Science graduate from the University of Glasgow. My absolute favourite thing to do in life is to create unique experiences for others to enjoy. The best way I have found to do this is to combine my computing and software design skills with my creative side to put together big projects. This can come in a variety of forms such as hosting live online/in person events, creating content, or even developing games.
